attributes.action: Prosecute the leaders of the foreign backed uprising in Syria for the massacre of 450 Kurds
attributes.additional_details:
The recent massacre of 450 Kurds is the single worst crime against humanity of the modern era. Those who support these groups should be punished, including those in the UK government as well as in Qatar and Saudi Arabia.

Those who committed the crime should be hunted down like they still do with elderly Nazis and sent to an international criminal court.
